microIoT.microIoT_WIFI|block: Wi-Fi 配置 名称: %SSID 密码: %PASSWORD 启动连接
microIoT.microIoT_MQTT|block: MQTT 配置|IOT_ID(用户): %IOT_ID|IOT_PWD(密码): %IOT_PWD|Topic(默认topic_0): %IOT_TOPIC|服务器: %SERVERS||IP: %IP
microIoT.microIoT_http_IFTTT|block: IFTTT 配置 事件: %EVENT 密钥: %KEY
microIoT.microIoT_http_post|block: IFTTT 发送 值1: %value1 值2: %value2 值3: %value3
microIoT.microIoT_http_TK_GET|block: ThingSpeak 发送 值1: %field1 || 值2: %field2 值3: %field3 值4: %field4 值5: %field5 值6: %field6 值7: %field7
